priest-1.text: Blessings upon you my child and praise be the Lord. I am Father Mulcahy. What can I do for you?

responses.priest-3: What's your reason for being here?

priest-1a.text: Hello again. Peace be with you.

responses.priest-3: I forgot, why are you here?

end-1.message: I could use your services. Why don't you join me?

priest-2.text: I am Father Peter Mulcahy, a priest of the Irish Catholic church, specifically the church of St. Michael, about 20 miles West of here in Lowell.

responses.priest-3: And what's your reason for being here?

end-1.message: Ok, I could definitely use you. Why don't you join me?

end-2.message: Sorry Father, I need to go. I'll speak to you later.

priest-3.text:
Professor Nymian was a parishioner of mine many years ago, so he asked me to come. I'm unsure how I may be of use, but I think he wants to cover all his bases, so to speak.
When dealing with the unknown, one's faith can play a part in keeping you sane and safe from evil!

end-1.message: Hmm, I suppose you could be right. Why don't you join me?

end-2.message: Uhhh, yeah, I need to go. Perhaps I'll talk to you later...

priest-4.text: I'm sorry my child, but I don't think you have need of me with the companions you already have with you. Come talk to me again if one of them should leave.

priest-5.text: Yes my child? How may I help?

responses.priest-6: I don't have need of you now.

priest-6.text: Ok, I'll be at the Arkham Museum should you need me again.
